title: Reschedule a Booked Event
description: A client needs to reschedule their booked wedding from a Saturday in June to a Saturday in September.

tasks.description: Look up the client's existing booking.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the original booking for the June date.

tasks.description: Check availability for the requested new date in September.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the ballroom is available on the new date.

tasks.description: Update the booking in the system to the new date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully moves the event to the new date.

tasks.description: Generate and send a contract addendum to the client reflecting the date change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the addendum for signature.
